definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: His bag was heaped with tissues.
sentences.chinese: 他的包中装了满满一包的卫生纸。

sentences.english: A bulky roll with the two-ply – I can probably take down half the roll in one day.
sentences.chinese: 一大卷两层的卫生纸，我一天就能吃掉半卷。

sentences.english: I include cleaning and paper products in my grocery budget as well.
sentences.chinese: 我在杂货预算中也包括清洁和卫生纸类产品。

sentences.english: Never use tissues or toilet paper to clean your eyeglasses.
sentences.chinese: 千万别用卫生纸或者手纸擦眼镜。

sentences.english: Only sterilized sanitary towels are safe to use.
sentences.chinese: 消毒的卫生纸才安全卫生。

sentences.english: Buy toilet paper at the stand,please.
sentences.chinese: 请到这个摊位买卫生纸。

sentences.english: Do we have any more rolls of toilet paper?
sentences.chinese: 我们还有更多的卷筒卫生纸吗？

sentences.english: Put rice in an old toilet paper roll and tape the ends to use as shakers.
sentences.chinese: 在老式卫生纸卷筒中放入大米，另一头用作振动器。

sentences.english: All of a sudden, a mass of tissue was thrown from somewhere on the trimmed shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一团卫生纸抛落在刚剪过的灌木上。

sentences.english: Wrap a rubber band around the roll of toilet paper to avoid the dangling temptation.
sentences.chinese: 在卫生纸外缠上橡皮筋防止总是晃来晃去的诱惑它们。

sentences.english: The counselor on our trip forgot our toilet paper, bread and tent.
sentences.chinese: 我们的辅导员忘了带我们的卫生纸，面包和帐篷。

sentences.english: One of the first recorded accounts of using hygienic paper was during the Sui Dynasty in 589.
sentences.chinese: 最早使用卫生纸的记录出现在隋朝589年。

sentences.english: Toilet paper is a better choice.
sentences.chinese: 卫生纸是一个比较好的选择。

sentences.english: Toilet Paper, Detergent, Matches, Mosquito Coil, Paint Brushes.
sentences.chinese: 卫生纸，洗粉，火柴，蚊香，油漆刷。

sentences.english: Cotton core is packed by toilet paper and finalized by net embossment.
sentences.chinese: 卫生纸包裹棉芯，棉芯网压定型。

sentences.english: We would also request that your daughter has tissues in her sack at all times.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我校还要求您的女儿一直都要随身装着卫生纸。

definition: sterilized absorbent cotton wool (used for dressings or cleansing wounds)/sanitary napkin/tampon
chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
